You first.

Welcome to the app that makes your health the top priority.

Learn more

The app made for you

CONTROL

Be in control of your own health! By using Dociva you take matters into your own hands, the app is here to help you manage your health in the best way.

SAFETY

All of the data that we receive from our users is encrypted and stored in our safe servers. If you're using Dociva you shouldn't be afraid of hacks and data leaks. Everything is stored safely. We guarantee that.

TRUSTED

We're trusted by many multi-billion dollar companies and over a million users just like you. We're also big believers in doctor-patient confidentiality, so you can be sure that by using Dociva you're in good hands.

Our Services

24/7 Support

Our staff is at your disposal every single hour of the day. Reach out for any problems.

Health documents

Get easy access to your health documents uploaded by your own doctors.

1-to-1 with doctors

Schedule appointments with your doctor instantly, without hassle. No fees required.

Doctors and nurses, one app away

Dociva allows you to take control of your own health and make same-day appointments with your doctor easily by using the app.

How it works

  • 01

    Create an account

    Firstly, you need to enter the information required by us to create your own account.

  • 02

    Get a membership

    Choose one of our membership plans to start your journey to better health and living.

  • 03

    Search for your doctors

    Using our search function you can find your doctors and nurses that are in the system.

  • 04

    Get acces to your documents

    The doctors upload your health documents after every session, so you can check back and take a look.

  • 05

    Set up 1-one-1 meetings

    With Dociva you can set up online meetings with your doctors whenever you feel like it.

What our members say

Lauren

I'm totally impressed by the quality of the Dociva app! I've been looking for a way to contact my doctors online and I think this is the most amazing way of doing that!

Alexia

Considering I have many health problems going to hospitals a few days a week became a chore. Luckily, with Dociva you can schedule those visits online, which makes it so much better.

Daniel

I suffer from mental health issues that manifest as Agoraphobia, so it was very hard for me to see a doctor in person. I was happy when I found Dociva because I can schedule the visits to be online, which is a huge weight off my shoulders.

Ryan

I can say that this app changed my life! I suffer from pancreatic cancer and the fact that I have all my medical files in one place with notes from my doctors is amazing!
